SEO_TITLE: ESLAND Awards 2024 - Celebrating the best of streaming and content creators
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best content creators from Spain, Latin America, and Andorra. Vote for your favorites! Celebrate the innovation and talent of Twitch, YouTube, and more
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Cinema has the Oscars, music has the Grammys, and streaming has the ESLAND. The awards that celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators from the Spanish-speaking community
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America, and Andorra united by creators and their communities, to remember and relive some of the best moments of the year.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two galas celebrated, one at the Palau de la Música Catalana in Barcelona, and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, all that remains is to wait for the third edition in Andorra.
BENTO_TITLE_1: Andorra: the zenith of the ESLAND awards
BENTO_CONTENT_1: A new edition full of novelties and content, which will start several weeks before the long-awaited gala. Special live shows, collaborations, concerts, and much more in what will be a real party dedicated to content creation.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: An awards gala full of top-level content and many surprises, where the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards will be discovered.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: This year, the moment of the blue carpet will be replaced and improved, thanks to the incredible Andorran landscapes, by a white carpet in the snow, located on the ski slopes of Andorra.
BENTO_TITLE_4: Enjoy the Reddit of the community
BENTO_CONTENT_4: This year, reddit will not be part of the awards voting, but it will be part of the community. The official subreddit of the ESLAND Awards is open for you. Share your clips, opinions, and interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
VIDEO_ALT: Esland - Awards to the Spanish-speaking Streaming community
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: Guide to the 3rd Edition of the ESLAND awards
